concept.title: Options for Sending Emails from a Flow
concept.shortdesc: To send an email from your flow, either use an existing email alert or create the email in the flow.

othermeta.content: ES PE EE PXE UE DE
othermeta.name: edition

dt.xref: Use an Email Alert with an Email Alert Action

dlentry.dd: Send an email by using an existing email alert that specifies the email content and recipients. The flow provides only the record ID to use for the email alert.

dt.xref: Create an Email in a Flow with the Send Email Action

dlentry.dd: Send and optionally log an email by specifying the email content and recipients in a flow.
